name: The Lost Mountain
description:
A single mountain rises from the plain. All around is dusty desolation. 

A portal brought you here; for any chance to escape Her wrath, another must be found.

This puzzle-light exploration game was originally created for the 2019 IF Advent Calendar, a collaborative tribute project for the 20th anniversary of the game Planescape: Torment. It then fell through a portal and emerged somewhat later.

In the original plan for this tribute project, each game was to be released one day at a time, with a Twine-based framing story in which the player character travels through a series of portals to escape the Lady of Pain. 

The other completed games from the IF Advent Calendar project are Advent Door by Andrew Plotkin and The Gateway of the Ferrets by Feneric.
